availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: N. H. McLean (Asst. Adjt. Genl, and Chief of Staff, Dept of OhioHamilton County, Ohio)

body.p: Graduate of the United States Military Academy, West Point, in 1848. Served as brevetted Second Lieutenant in California until 1854. Commander of the Washington Arsenal. Promoted to Major in 1862. Assigned to the Adjutant-General's Department in Cincinnati, Ohio in 1862. Transferred to the Department of the Ohio in August 1862. Chief of Staff and Assistant Adjutant-General to General Wright in the Department of the Ohio on August 23, 1862.

ab.bibl: Reports of Committees of the House of Representatives for the Second Session of the Forty-Third Congress: Report No. 279, vol.277, vol.279, 1874-'75. (Washington: Government Printing Office, 1875) p. 1-6
